subject: Record Retention Schedule and Digitization of Records in NHAI-reg.
text: HRaiy 7yt rTHTf%iferabrut (Tsq 4Rae7 & TNTANf TAT4, 4RGt TAR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Tra T 6il-5 Q 6, 8a27-10, ERoF, #f fvalt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 TTN /Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Administration/2023 Policy Circular No.1.9.10/ 2023 dated 08th November , 2023 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. 11041/236/2021-Admin (Comp. No. 106634)} Sub: Record Retention Schedule and Digitization of Records in NHAI-reg: As per IT Divisions Office Order No. NHAI/ERP /IT/40/2019/90 dated 15.05.2019 regarding digitization of documents, 22 types of project documents have been identified for digitization and uploading on the portal: Documents Types (Digitized & Total Document Types Uploaded) FFeasibility Report 2 Detailed Project Report 3 Ba notification 4 3A notification 5 3D notification 6 3G notification 7 3H notification 8 Responses to pre-bid queries by Authority for civil works 9 Letter of Acceptance (LoA) for civil works 10 Memorandum of Site Handover 11 Item Rate Contract 12 EPC Contract 13 PPP Concession Agreements 14 Monthly Progress Report 15 PCOD Certificate 16 Completion Certificate (COD Certificate) Contd_2I - 91 { T m NHAL
